title: Man dies in workplace accident at Whitley Bay funfair
summary: Man in his 20s declared dead after suffering serious head injuries at Spanish City Summer Funfair A man in his 20s has died after suffering serious head injuries in a workplace accident at a funfair in North Tyneside, police have said. Emergency services were called to the Spanish City Summer Funfair in Whitley Bay after being alerted at 2.15pm that a man had been injured. He was treated at the scene but was declared dead a short time later. The victim has not been named. Continue reading...
